meals.name: Spaghetti Bolognese
meals.cooking_base: Brown {protein_weight}g {protein_name}, add {sauce_weight}g {sauce_name}, simmer 5 min. Cook {carb_weight}g {carb_name} separately. Combine and serve.

meals.name: Meatballs with Pasta or Spaghetti
meals.cooking_base: Shape mince into balls, brown, add {sauce_weight}g {sauce_name}, simmer 10 min. Cook {carb_weight}g {carb_name} separately. Serve together.

meals.name: Pasta Bake (Mince)
meals.cooking_base: Brown {protein_weight}g {protein_name}, add {sauce_weight}g {sauce_name}, mix with cooked {carb_weight}g {carb_name}, top with cheese, bake 15 min.

meals.name: Beef Burgers
meals.cooking_base: Shape mince into patties, grill, brush with {sauce_weight}g {sauce_name}, serve in {carb_weight}x {carb_name} with extras.

meals.name: Cottage Pie
meals.cooking_base: Brown {protein_weight}g {protein_name}, mix with {sauce_weight}g {sauce_name} and veg as desired, top with mashed {carb_weight}g {carb_name}, bake until golden.

meals.name: Chilli Con Carne
meals.cooking_base: Brown {protein_weight}g {protein_name}, add {sauce_weight}g {sauce_name}, simmer 5 min. Cook {carb_weight}g {carb_name} separately. Serve chilli over rice.

meals.name: Beef Burrito
meals.cooking_base: Brown {protein_weight}g {protein_name}, add {sauce_weight}g {sauce_name}, fill {carb_weight}x {carb_name} with mix and extras, roll up.

meals.name: Beef Tacos
meals.cooking_base: Brown {protein_weight}g {protein_name}, add {sauce_weight}g {sauce_name}, fill {carb_weight}x {carb_name} with mix and extras.

meals.name: Loaded Nachos
meals.cooking_base: Brown {protein_weight}g {protein_name}, add {sauce_weight}g {sauce_name}, layer over {carb_weight}g {carb_name}, top with cheese, grill.

meals.name: Stuffed Peppers
meals.cooking_base: Brown {protein_weight}g {protein_name}, add {sauce_weight}g {sauce_name}, fill halved {carb_weight}x {carb_name}, bake until tender.

meals.name: Chicken Pittas
meals.cooking_base: Grill chicken, brush with {sauce_weight}g {sauce_name}, fill {carb_weight}x {carb_name} with extras.

meals.name: Chicken Burgers
meals.cooking_base: Grill chicken, brush with {sauce_weight}g {sauce_name}, serve in {carb_weight}x {carb_name} with extras.

meals.name: Chicken Curry
meals.cooking_base: Brown {protein_weight}g {protein_name}, add {sauce_weight}g {sauce_name}, simmer 8 min. Cook {carb_weight}g {carb_name} separately. Serve curry over rice.

meals.name: Chicken Teriyaki
meals.cooking_base: Marinate {protein_weight}g {protein_name} with {sauce_weight}g {sauce_name}. Cook chicken until done. Cook {carb_weight}g {carb_name} separately. Serve teriyaki chicken over rice.

meals.name: Sweet and Sour Stir Fry
meals.cooking_base: Slice chicken, stir fry with {sauce_weight}g {sauce_name} and extras, serve over {carb_weight}g {carb_name}.

meals.name: Chicken Fajitas
meals.cooking_base: Slice chicken, marinate with {sauce_weight}g {sauce_name}, stir fry with extras, fill {carb_weight}x {carb_name}.
